name: Raceland
description: Raceland is the best car racing game for racing enthusiasts. Drift, change your vehicle and start the race! In the vote you must first use the tool you control and use it, complete the chapters, earn money, and unlock the locked vehicles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows® 7,8,8.1,10 Processor: Intel Pentium® 4 or equivalent, 3.0 GHz or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB or more, NVIDIA GeForce (6600 or better); ATI Radeon (9500 or better); Intel G45 Express Chipset DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
